verses.verse: Then answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Bildad <S%H1085><s%> the Shuhite <S%H7747><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>,
Dominion <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8687><s%> and fear <S%H6343><s%> are with him, he maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in his high places <S%H4791><s%>.
Is there <S%H3426><s%> any number <S%H4557><s%> of his armies <S%H1416><s%>? and upon whom doth not his light <S%H216><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ?

How then can man <S%H582><s%> be justified <S%H6663><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>? or how can he be clean <S%H2135><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that is born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> ?
Behold even to the moon <S%H3394><s%>, and it shineth <S%H166><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not; yea, the stars <S%H3556><s%> are not pure <S%H2141><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his sight <S%H5869><s%>.
How much less man <S%H582><s%>, that is a worm <S%H7415><s%>? and the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, which is a worm <S%H8438><s%> ?
